phrases: How have not you noticed yet?
Then it is just the two of us today.
There is other good stuff on the menu here.
Like the fried rice and the rice omelets...
Tamarai-san, you look a little ugly today.
It is that obvious I was crying, huh?
If you did not bump into anything,
Guess I was stung in my sleep!
Have you ever hurt someone or clashed with them because you are too smart?
or tell you to do everything by yourself?
You went to the hospital, right?
It will take two weeks to heal.
I can exercise after that, but with caution.
Then you can make the tournament!
You can come by practice until it heals.
I think I would drag the team down if I played in a match after taking two weeks off.
And I do not know if I will be able to move right.
I think I am just going to retire.
Let the others know for me.
You should try the rice omelet next time!
I have got to use the bathroom.
What were you going to do?
Drag her in front of Tama and make her apologize.
She wants to stay friends with Kariu-san,
so she will figure this out herself.
I have been doing that all day.
She was finally smiling at practice.
Now it is making her cry again.
It is hard for me to watch.
Kariu, are you not going to practice?
I am going to study a bit today.
Then since I am not working today, maybe I should do my homework before I go home.
Sorry, I have got somewhere to be today.
At this rate, you will fail next week, too!
I am being a nosy old man and leaving you two alone together.
Be grateful and enjoy your youth.
How long is he going to stay?!
I was just waiting for everyone to leave...
I do not want to be seen dragging my foot like this!
Guess I would better be go
Then let us go home together!
You are not making any sense.
Do not try to make sense of it!
Man, you are extra grumpy today.
Do not talk like I am always grumpy!
Stop sulking, and let us go!
I cannot just leave a crying girl alone and go home.
I am too wimpy to carry you,
but I can lend you a shoulder,
and get you down the stairs.
The last thing you need is a fall.
I would hate girls like me.
Stupidly proud, short-tempered, and utterly incomprehensible.
I was so mean to Honoka.
She might never speak to me again.
But I cannot be honest about my feelings.
I am really starting to hate myself.
Man, I just do not know.
There is just so much happening that the subject does not see.
Even though one of the goals of ReLIFE
is to reinvigorate emotions that have withered with age
by getting him involved with adolescent kids.
by getting him involved with adolescent kids.
Well, I am sure Kaizaki-san will notice something is wrong soon.
What is been going on lately?
I thought Hishiro-san and Kariu had finally became friends,
but now even Tamarai-san's eating lunch alone.
Kariu has not been going to practice.
Things do not seem right between her and Oga, too.
What is with this awkward atmosphere?
Do my seniors hate each other?
You are absolutely right, and I am glad you feel that way.
But I want you to stay out of it.
Let us see...I need your advice.
Like I said, I need your help.
Since it would be a little wordy for LIME,
I figured in person was better.
I have never had a long phone call with a friend.
It never even occurred to me.
Generally when you go to a friend's house, their family's around.
Wait, is Hishiro-san freaking out because it is just me here?
Should I give her an excuse to leave?
I doubt she cares at all.
Wait, I am the one freaking out!
How can I, with you guys watching?!
It is about Kariu-san and Tamarai-san.
They were so close, and now they will not speak to each other.
I was wondering if you knew what happened.
It is bugging me, too, but I do not know.
But I am surprised you have been so perceptive.
It was not long ago that you would have asked them directly.
But you realized you could not, so you came to see me.
Why did I go the long way around?
Oh, I think it is because it is not my problem.
I am emotionally dumb, so I make a lot of mistakes.
If it is just me, that is fine.
I cannot afford to be stupid and mess up.
You do not need to be so hard on yourself.
Last year, there was bullying in my class.
It was not pleasant to see.
I had this weird sense of duty,
like it was my job to stop it.
So I told them to stop this nonsense.
All I have to do is put up with it, and it will not get any worse.
But in any society, you just need to grin and bear it.
Even if it is not fair.
I think she was doing her best
to maintain the balance in her little world.
But I stepped in, heeding only my emotions,
I just do not know how to act while considering other people's feelings.
After that, I did what she said.
She changed schools after the year ended.
Something similar happened to me last year.
At my last... school, a senpai was... bullied.
I got all fired up and tried to help.
I lashed out at the people bullying her.
Senpai was maintaining her own balance.
I do not know why you are apologizing.
S-Sorry, I did not mean to do that!
I will not call the police.
Is it best that I do nothing?
But I just do not like it.
I do not like seeing them apart.
What if I destroy everything again?
I was not supposed to be their peer in school.
I do not have the right to upset their lives.
Then let us get revenge together.
I want to defeat the me that is dragging this failure around.
I do not want to forget my failure.
But if I carry it with me as a bad memory, and keep running away,
I think there are things you learn to do through failing.
Will you get revenge with me?
Are you good to clean up?
Do not push yourself too hard!
Maybe she is in the clubroom?
That is sort of beside the point.
I want to play this last tournament with her.
so I do not know what to say.
I cannot bring myself to talk to her.
That redhead was still at school, right?
I am going to make her listen to how Tama feels.
I am allowed to do that much, right?
He is taking me to Honoka...
From here on, keep it down.
We will do what you say.
I was not going to play volleyball in high school.
Hishiro-san, what was that fight on thing all about?
I learned about it when I studied up on sports teams.
It is a teamwork ritual where everyone joins hands and...
